summary: Modified version of Trillville\'s TV ENB Final
descriptionHtml:
This ENB is a colourful adaptation of Trillville\'s TV ENB Final. I tried to maintain the original cinematic fantasy feel of TV ENB while injecting more colour and tweaking other settings to my liking.

INSTALLATION

1. This mod runs off of ENB Series v0.152 so you must first download the binary files at http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0152.htm and extract every file from the \'WrapperVersion\' folder to your root Skyrim install folder (where TESV.exe is located). 

2. Download Colourful TV ENB and extract all files EXCEPT the Options folder to that same root Skyrim folder. Overwrite files when asked.

3. Open up the Options folder and drag and drop your selected enbseries.ini file, enbeffect.fx and enbeffectprepass.fx file into your Skyrim root folder with the other ENB files.

4. Open your SkyrimPrefs.ini file located in your \"My Documents\" folder and make sure these lines are set

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1

5. Activate both of the included ESPs and launch your game!

NOTE: I have my brightness set at 7 notches from the right as this achieves the best balance of colour vibrancy and lighting ON MY SCREEN. Your screen may be configured differently so be sure to mess around with the brightness until you find what works for you. 

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/16/oblivion201301241238195.png/][IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/7671/oblivion201301241238195.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/811/oblivion201301241229489.png/][IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/5594/oblivion201301241229489.png[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/20/oblivion201301241245204.png/][IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/9003/oblivion201301241245204.png[/IMG][/URL]
author: GBpwny and Trillville
